content.question: The purpose of the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1933 was to

choices.label: ease the economic difficulties of sharecroppers and tenant farmers
provide for the distribution of surplus meat and produce to the poor
reapportion electoral districts to give farmers greater representation in Congress
expand agricultural production by subsidizing farmers
raise farm prices by limiting agricultural production

content.answer: raise farm prices by limiting agricultural production

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
